overview: This document outlines the software requirements for AutoMarketer, a high complexity api project.
scope: The project encompasses development of a complete api with estimated 200 hours of development effort.

functional_requirements.description: up system, and be capable of dialing 20, 30, 40, or even 50 calls at once, because in the USA, most calls go to voicemail, so when there are more agents, we can increase the dialing speed to make sure agents get connected to live customers
pulls data from and pushes call outcomes back into your CRM
speak with them directly and collect all the necessary information
choose the voice we want to use

handle simultaneous calling, for example, if 10 or 15 agents are working, it should be able to dial calls on a large scale, and as soon as someone picks up, the call should be automatically connected to a live agent
automatically detect whether it's a voicemail or a live customer
based detection to skip or leave a pre-recorded message
create as many AI agents as needed at any time, with no limitation

non_functional_requirements.description: System should respond within 2 seconds for all user interactions
All data transmissions must be encrypted using industry standards
Interface should be intuitive and require minimal training
System uptime should be 99.9% excluding scheduled maintenance

acceptance_criteria: up system, and be capable of dialing 20, 30, 40, or even 50 calls at once, because in the USA, most calls go to voicemail, so when there are more agents, we can increase the dialing speed to make sure agents get connected to live customers is fully functional
User can access this feature easily
